t: Stores creative guidelines - Ad specs & Requirements | Amazon Ads
s: The best seller tile shows the top-selling products associated with your brand. It automatically shows 5 products at a time. This tile can only be selected if your Store is associated with your brand’s products in the catalog. The tile won’t be shown if there are no best seller products.
Every Store page is divided into tiles. Store content tiles have 4 sizes: Full Width, Large, Medium, and Small.

Variable-height tiles Variable-height tiles allow you to change the tile shape ratio depending on the height of the content. Image and text tiles support variable height. Adjust to your preferred image height by moving the vertical handles in the tool.
